reviews.review: i like portal game
非常棒的解密游戏！！！从来没想到一把传送门枪的谜题能整出这么多新花样，画风也非常不错，手持的手感也很好，操作简单，最后剧情部分环境和色调渲染气氛真的极佳，整个场景布置真的用心了，有庞让大物令人神往的感觉。最终的boss战难度也不高，非常轻松休闲，值得一玩！！！
great game, but it is short.
A piece of video game history

The portal franchise is a very unique platformer making you use a portal gun to resolve puzzles and get you through test chambers.
The game isn't that long but defenitely a experience you don't want to miss.

First PC game and I loved it!

Literally one of the best, most cohesive, well designed, and well-written games I've ever played.
Only gripe is that it's short, but at the same time I feel that's working in it's favor.  It doesn't overstay its welcome, and it's exactly as long as it needs to be.
Much nostalgia. I love this game so much for how original it is! This is definitely a must play for all gamer's

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
Ну это настоящий classic......  Я бы даже сказал plesently.

¿Cómo no vas a haber jugado al Portal? 
Do it. 
NOW.
와! 뇌가 말랑말랑해진다 와!

장점: 밸브의 독창성이 끝내준다. 
단점: 스토리가 거의 없는 수준이고(뭐, 이 게임은 하프라이프 외전격인 게임이라 그렇다 쳐도) 플레이 타임이 3시간이라는 짧은 플레이 타임을 가지고 있다.
결론: 그래도 장점이 단점들을 다 커버쳐준다.

Um jogo com uma quantidade razoável de desafios e muito divertido!! Simples e prático de entender e ao mesmo tempo com uma história para dar risada enquanto passa por cada etapa. Recomendo 100%

historia interessante com misterios, linha comica divertida, personagens marcantes e jogabilidade simples e bem feita tudo q um jogo precisa
melhor jogo de puzze.

Es un juego con unas mecanicas simples, pero con una historia impresionante de fondo, hay muchos secretos detras de los muros de las instalaciones de Aperture Laboratories esperando a que los descubras.
La saga de Portal desde que la jugué por primera vez se ha convertido en una de mis sagas favoritas y con razón, porque junto con Half-Life; VALVE, ha demostrado que sabe como hacer obras de arte, historias que se te quedan marcadas por siempre.
Si o si es necesario jugar Portal 2 luego de terminar de jugar éste, porque es allí donde se complementa de forma maravillosa toda la trama.
Super recomendado!
Excelente ambientación y diseño de niveles.
Its good

If you Don't know what Portal is and if you haven't played it yet. where have you been? A brilliant and fantastic game. I keep coming back to it whether watching gameplay or playing it myself. one of the greatest games ever. simple as. play it. then play the second one.
Es un excelente juego de puzzle. 10/10

Первый Portal, начало истории, здесь все хорошо. Карты хорошо проработаны, хорошие головоломки, но есть один неприятный минус. Это русская озвучка. В этой игре она ужасна. А так определённо рекомендую.
Simple yet beautiful, the design of the puzzles will amaze young and old, with a decent story I consider this game a personal gem
portal is one of the best games ive played, difficult but fun, love how it test your mental capability
A great puzzle/strategy game, would definitely recommend playing!
